entry.title: Difference
entry.content:
The difference between input button and button?

Similarities :

​ input type=”button” />——— button type=”button”>anything /button>

​ input type=”submit” />——— button type=”submit”>anything /button>

​ input type=”reset” />——— button type=”reset”>anything /button>

Differences:

​ (1) If you use input button, its value just be text. value=”value”,but if you use button,you can set anything as a button,such as an image,a paragraph.

​ (2)Submit button is the default value of button.
entry.summary:
The difference between input button and button?

Similarities :

​ input type=”button” />——— button type=”button”>anything /button>

​ input type=”submit” />——— button type=”submit”>anything /button>

​ input type=”reset” />——— button type=”reset”>anything /button>

entry.title: HTML
entry.content:
1.a Tag

This paragraph can show the “a” symbol with three different ways.

this  syntax has only one symbol “#”,it means that if you click it ,the page will go back to the top.

this syntax means that you can set any symbol or word as the mark.

when you click this,it will show the location of your mark. 

this syntax means that you can set any symbol or word as the mark,its attribute is id.

when you click this,it will show the location of your mark. Remember that “#” sign is very important,please don’t miss it.

2.image

use this syntax: it will not switch to a new line automatically.

​ img src=”” / ; you also need to add bracket on the both side<>.

​ img src=”net address” .

​ title=”when you put the mouse on the picture,this sentence will be shown “

​ alt=”if the picture fails to load,this word will be shown”

​ width=”200px” height=”300px” px:pixel像素

​ border=”2” align=”left/center/right”

For example

use this :

​ img src=”gem.webp” title=”邓紫棋GEM” alt=”something wrong” width=”300px” border=”1” align=”center”

​ Remember to add bracket on the both side.

how to get the picture to jump to your destination address when you click it ?

answer: use “a” sign. a href=”https://www.baidu.com" img /a

3.Table

  1. table: it means the whole table.
  2. tr: table row
  3. td: table data cell
  4. th: table header cell

  5. attribute

    6. border
    width:it has two value,percentage and pixel.
    style: border-collapse:collapse
    align:left center right

  6. the attribute of tr:

    7. align:left center right
    valign:bottom top middle
    bgcolor:pink

  7. collapse cell

    8. rowspan colspan

for example:

grade class number header teacher
senior one one one hundred linfeng
senior two two ninety nine chenyun

4.Form

Form is an element of block.

  • function:Form can be used to submit data
  • action:submit the form to a place
  • method:how to submit data? post and get
  • id:we specify the element is unique
  • name:how to submit data? post and get
  • class:set the style of the name of the element
  • style:set the specific style in line
  • target: it decides if we open the new site in a new window or in the current window? _self and _ blank
  • we must set the name attribute!Otherwise we cannot perform the operation of submitting.

for example:

Get and Post

  1. get:parameters will follow the net address.
  2. post:we cannot see any parameters.
  3. post is more safer than get,but get is more faster than post,its speed is almost two times of the later.
  4. get has the limitation of length,however,post doesn't.
  5. get has cache.

5.Input

  • type: text
    • value:any
    readonly:(readonly)you cannot change its status
    length:any
  • type: password
    • value:any
    readonly:(readonly)you cannot change its status
    length:any
  • type:ratio, we need to bind the two choices by setting the same value of name
    • man women
  • type:checkbox,it allows us to choose multiple values.
    • love scientific and fictional action
  • type:file,it allows us to choose a file to submit.

  • type:hidden,it hide some things to the user,they are state thing.

  • type:date.If you use a mac,please choose google chrome.
    • ep:input type="date" />

6.Button

  • common button:
    • input type="button" value="commonbutton"
    ep:
  • submit button:
    • input type="submit" value="submitbutton"
    ep:

    if we put the submit button in a form,we can submit our data to the destination site.
    we alse can disable the button by using disable:
  • reset button: we can just use it to reset the valut we input,not the state value.
    • ep:

## 7.Textarea

This control allows us to input multiple line text.

Syntax: textarea></textarea

You can adjust its size by hand,it has two attributes rows and cols,their values are number.

Syntax: textarea cols=”89”

ep：

8.label

Function: When you click the label, the cursor will focus on what you clicked.

Syntax: label for=”as same as id”> label </label anything id=”as same as for”

Ep:

9.Select

It has two choices: select and option,select is the drop down list,and option is the optional value,which you can choose.

Select has those attributes: multiple choice,size,disabled .

Syntax:

(1)multiple choice : multiple=”multiple”

(2)size shows the number of the choice that you can see: size=”0”

(3)disabled=”disabled”

Option has those attributes: default value,size,disabled .

Syntax:

(1)we have two ways to set the default value:

​ one is put the value at the first location;one is add “selected=”selected”” to the optional value.

(2)disabled=”disabled”,it just disable the current optional value.

10. String entity

How to output the syntax?

< &lt ( Less than)

“>” &gt ( greater than)

whitespace &nbsp (No-break space)

Copyright &copy

11.categoties of label

There are three different styles of label element in html:

  1. block element
    2. characteristic:
    (1)set width，height,align.(2)automatically switch to a new line.
    for example:
    (1)<div>(2)<h>(3)<table>
  2. inline element
    3. characteristic:(1)just set width (2)just left and right (3)no br and align
    for example:
    (1)img(2)button(3)label,select,textarea
  3. inline block element
    4. characteristic:(3)no br for example:
    (1)img(2)input(3)td
## 12.Conclusion

  1. font?

  2. pre?

  3. div?span?

  4. text label？

this  syntax has only one symbol “#”,it means that if you click it ,the page will go back to the top.

entry.title: ILETS
entry.content:
Vocabulary

We eat flowers.

1.vegetable: We eat the part of a plant.It has no seeds.

2.flower: The part of the plant makes seeds.

3.leaf: The flat,green part of a plant.

4.root: We cannot see it because it is under the ground.It grows down in the dirt.

5.stem: It is the part that holds the plant up,we say trunk for a tree, a stem for a small plant.

6.seed: The part of the plant that grows into a new plant.

7.carrot: A long orange vegetable.

8.eat: To put food into your mouth and chew, swallow.

9.potato: Round white vegetables that grow in the dirt.

10.lettuce: A plant with large green leaves that are eaten raw, especially in salad.(生菜🥬 莴苣)

11.pea: The seed of a pea plant that we eat.

12.smell: To have an odor.(odor is a distinctive smell, especially an unpleasant one)
entry.summary:
Vocabulary

We eat flowers.

1.vegetable: We eat the part of a plant.It has no seeds.

2.flower: The part of the plant makes seeds.

3.leaf: The flat,green part of a plant.

entry.title: How to change the background of the Blog?
entry.content:
How to change the background of the blog in next theme?

First step:

Open your next themes directory,find the document “_config.yml”
as the following picture:

As you can see,I have canceled the symbol “#” before the last sentence.

Second step

Open the source documentary, creat. _data/styles.styl.And copy “styles.styl” to css documentary.

Tird step:

Open next->source->css->main.styl, slide down to the bottom of the file

Add the syntax to the file:

Ok,if you have any problems,please comment.
